blog.name: i-used-to-wear-the-fedora
blog.title: I'm a Monster Without a Fedora

summary: My Hero Academia The World Unknown AU
body:
My Hero Academia The World Unknown AU

-Izuku is an orphan and has spent most of his life raised in an orphanage with many other kids who he considers his brothers and sisters.

-He’s 12 years old and the other kids his age are Momo, Ochako, Denki, Kirishima and Todoroki and they’re all extremely close.

-But there’s a boy named Kota who looks up to Izuku as a big brother, he always wears a special hat their caretaker got for him.

-One day Kota is adopted but when Izuku and Ochako go to return the boy’s hat before he leaves they find out he wasn’t adopted.

-Kota was killed and taken by demons to be eaten as a deal with the orphanage’s caretaker to give the kids away as food.

-Now with the only thing left Kota being his hat, Izuku in his friends are vent on helping everyone escape the orphanage.

-Years later in Musutafu, Japan Aizawa is out on patrol when he stumbles on a group of kids in white dresses with numbers on their neck, about 14/15 years old rooting through trash for food.

-They’re apprehensive at the adult at first when he brings them back to school with him to see Recovery Girl.

-The children are unusually quiet and close to each other while barely talking.

-To his surprise they all have quirks except the green haired boy that were suppressed for a long time and are put into 1-A as a result.

-Slowly they find out about what happened to the new students and after an incident at USJ they find out about demons and their deal with the villains.

-The demons are trying to get the group back and during the Stain arc instead of a nomu, it’s a demon that tries to take Izuku back.

-Toga is a demon who can change her shape and was sent specifically to bring the group back to the orphanage by the caretaker. The only thing she wants in return is being able to keep Izuku for herself.

-Overhaul is also a demon who uses the Eri as bait to bring other children back to him to eat.

-Eri is terrified of all adults as a result and she’s hiding from everyone after being saved, only bring coaxed out by All Might in his civilian form, showing off the numbers on his neck to show he’s just like her.

-Before he became All Might, Yagi was raised in one of the orphanages similar to the group’s but along with many other children was saved by Nana.

-She’s the only hero he’d ever seen defeat demons with such ease and after hearing the story Izuku begs to have One for All yo help protect his friends and family. The man is more than happy to oblige.

summary: who asked for another villain!all might fic?
title: who asked for another villain!all might fic?
body:
No one?

Oh.

Here u go anyways

Ad Astra

“You like mayhem, Mr. All Might. You feed off of the chaos you provoke. To put it simply, you’re a terrifying force of nature. But it’s all just a cover, isn’t it? The truth is that you’d rather burn down the world with your own power rather than face it.” You paused and peered at the towering villain before you. “You’re afraid.”

Villain AU with a Villain All Might

summary: Heyo, names ArukaJoe and I'll be honest. Ever since I was small I always loved the night sky. Stars, the moon, it was always...
caption:
Heyo, names ArukaJoe and I’ll be honest. Ever since I was small I always loved the night sky. Stars, the moon, it was always peaceful. I grew to learn about astrology when I was a pre-teen and ever since have been fascinated by the stars. My favorite color is orange, and I love me some boys with glasses. XD

ArukaJoe can be found @aruka-syrafx and on twitter!!

Pre-orders have been extended until March 17!

blog.name: theherogang
blog.title: Heroes
blog.description: My Hero Academia blog. Not spoiler free!

summary: I don’t like Mineta either because he might be used as a comedic relief horny character but it’s a little bit deeper than that....
question: I don’t like Mineta either because he might be used as a comedic relief horny character but it’s a little bit deeper than that. He disrespects every girl there by attempting to watch them change, going through their stuff, and touching them without permission and it’s never seriously addressed as a problem. I just think he’s kind of a garbage character currently. Would love to see him mature and work harder towards being a hero.
answer:
We already have Kaminari who likes girls, tries to flirt, you know… All that kinda stuff. But he is a decent person and never takes it too far like Mineta does. Horikoshi wanted to create a comedic relief character but ended up creating a character that almost all bnha fans hate. 

I don’t want to sound pessimistic but I don’t think Mineta will mature or have a character development at all. There are some characters in Class 1-A that are there just because Horikoshi had to fill the quota of students in the class (20 students per class), so we will never see much about them other than some little non plot relevant interactions… In my opinion those characters are: Mineta, Koda, Sato, Shoji and Toru. Of course, as I’ve said before, this is just my opinion and maybe Horikoshi surprises us with some new arc in which one of those characters I’ve mentioned is actually relevant to the plot.

Of course, as I’ve said before, this is just my opinion and maybe Horikoshi surprises us with some new arc in which one of those characters I’ve mentioned is actually relevant to the plot.
